offsetScrollbars.description: Determines whether scrollbars should be offset with padding on given axis, false by default
offsetScrollbars.description_zh: 确定滚动条是否应在给定轴上偏移内边距，默认为 false

onBottomReached.description: Called when scrollarea is scrolled all the way to the bottom
onBottomReached.description_zh: 当 scrollarea 一直滚动到底部时调用

onScrollPositionChange.description: Called with current position (x and y coordinates) when viewport is scrolled
onScrollPositionChange.description_zh: 在滚动视口时使用当前位置（x 和 y 坐标）调用

onTopReached.description: Called when scrollarea is scrolled all the way to the top
onTopReached.description_zh: 当 scrollarea 一直滚动到顶部时调用

scrollHideDelay.description: Scroll hide delay in ms, applicable only when type is set to hover or scroll, 1000 by default
scrollHideDelay.description_zh: 滚动隐藏延迟（以毫秒为单位），仅在 type 设置为 hover 或 scroll（默认为 1000）时适用

scrollbarSize.description: Scrollbar size, any valid CSS value for width/height, numbers are converted to rem, default value is 0.75rem
scrollbarSize.description_zh: 滚动条大小，宽度/高度的任何有效 CSS 值，数字转换为 rem，默认值为 0.75rem

scrollbars.description: Axis at which scrollbars must be rendered, 'xy' by default
scrollbars.description_zh: 必须呈现滚动条的轴，默认为 'xy'

type.description:
Defines scrollbars behavior, hover by default
- hover – scrollbars are visible when mouse is over the scroll area
- scroll – scrollbars are visible when the scroll area is scrolled
- always – scrollbars are always visible
- never – scrollbars are always hidden
- auto – similar to overflow: auto – scrollbars are always visible when the content is overflowing
type.description_zh:
定义滚动条行为，默认悬停
- hover – 当鼠标位于滚动区域上时，滚动条可见
- scroll – 滚动区域滚动时滚动条可见
- always – 滚动条始终可见
- never – 滚动条始终处于隐藏状态
- auto – 类似于 overflow： auto – 当内容溢出时，滚动条始终可见

viewportProps.description: Props passed down to the viewport element
viewportProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 viewport 元素的 props

viewportRef.description_zh: 分配视口元素（可滚动容器）ref
